forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers this afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
